item.title: BizTalk Summit 2015 in London - Part 2 - Turning of the Tide?
item.description: From the BizTalk Summit 2015 in London - Microsoft now appears to have a solid architecture for Modern Integration, and we now may be witnessing the start of the turning of the tide.

item.title: BizTalk Summit 2015 in London - Part 1 - Microsoft's Roadmap for Integration
item.description: From the BizTalk Summit 2015 in London - a summary of Microsoft's roadmap for integration.
